name: FortifyOnDemandStatic
description: Submit code for Fortify on Demand security assessment
author: Fortify

inputs.name: FortifyProjects
inputs.label: Source code location
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path on the agent where your source code files are located.

inputs.name: BSIToken
inputs.label: Build Server Integration Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Generate a BSI Token. For more information, see https://ams.fortify.com/Docs/en/Content/20_Applications/1_Tenant_Apps/06_App_Tabs/09_BuildServer/BSI_Using.htm

inputs.name: APIKey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use secret build variables to protect your API key

inputs.name: APISecret
inputs.label: API Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use secret build variables to protect your secret key

instanceNameFormat: Run Fortify on Demand static assessment on $(FortifyProjects)
